location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘No.11. Shaikh Ahmad bin Ibrahim, Minister of the Interior, Muscat and Oman’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This black and white photograph shows Shaikh Ahmad bin Ibrahim, Minister of the Interior of the Government of Muscat and Oman. Four other men in traditional Omani dress with rifles can be seen standing behind him to the right (the man furthest to the left in the image is largely obscured by Shaikh Ahmad bin Ibrahim, and only one side of the man furthest to the right is visible in the image).Inscriptions:Printed label on the reverse of the image: ‘No.11. Shaikh Ahmad bin Ibrahim, Minister of the Interior, Muscat and Oman’
